snippet: The brothers planned to attack the mission in Pretoria, as well as an unidentified “Jewish building” in the country, officials said....
abstract: South Africa files terrorism-related charges against twin brothers Brandon-Lee and Tony-Lee Thulsie over plot to attack United States Embassy and join Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The brothers planned to attack the mission in Pretoria, as well as an unidentified “Jewish building” in the country, officials said.

headline.main: South Africa Charges Twins Over Plot to Attack U.S. Embassy and Join ISIS
headline.print_headline: South Africa Says Twins  Sought to Hit U.S. Target

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
